summary: Stress is a normal part of life and can have both positive and negative impacts on us.
Coping with stress effectively can lead to a sense of pride and motivation.
Excessive and prolonged stress can result in various physical and emotional consequences.
Taking care of our mental and physical well-being is essential in managing stress.
Training our bodies and minds can help us cope with stress and benefit both ourselves and those around us.
